name: Vegetable Couscous with Lamb
ingredients: spices (ras el-hanout / turmeric / ginger / cumin / salt / pepper)
steps: Peel and cut carrots and turnips; cut zucchinis and carrots into chunks.
In a pot, sauté the lamb (or chicken) pieces with olive oil, onions and garlic until browned.
Add the vegetables, chickpeas, spices, and cover with water or broth; simmer until meat and vegetables are tender.
Prepare the couscous according to package instructions (steaming or rehydration).
Serve the couscous topped with the vegetable-and-meat stew, and ladle over some of the broth.
description: Traditional Moroccan couscous with vegetables and meat – hearty and comforting.
